properties.name: sec.urls.ciks
properties.description: URL from SEC website that holds data of prominent CIKs.

properties.name: sec.local-folders.ciks
properties.description: Location of folder where CIK data is stored.

properties.name: database.batch-size.inserts
properties.description: Batch size for insert operations in database.

properties.name: sec.urls.company-details.prefix
properties.description: domain name and other non varying prefix of URL that offers company details.

properties.name: sec.urls.company-details.suffix
properties.description: Suffix that must be appended to create URL that offers company details.
